message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you, but I'm open to discussing the price if needed.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is quite a bit higher for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,000? That's the highest I'm willing to go.
